intro1.japan:
アジア最大のDevRel
カンファレンス

intro2.japan: カンファレンスについて

about1.japan: カンファレンスについて

about2.english: DevRel/Asia 2020 is online/virtual conference focuses on DevRel in Asia Pacific. We share great experiences about developer relations, developer experiences, developer marketing and developer communities.
about2.japan: DevRel/Asia 2020はアジアおよび太平洋地域を対象としたオンラインカンファレンスです。DevRel、開発者向けマーケティング、開発者体験、コミュニティに関する優れた体験を共有します。
about2.korea: DevRel/Asia 2020은 아시아 태평양 지역에서 개최하는 온라인 컨퍼런스입니다. DevRel, 개발자 마케팅, 개발자 경험, 커뮤니티의 유익한 경험을 공유합니다.
about2.india: DevRel/Asia 2020 is online/virtual conference focuses on DevRel in Asia Pacific. We share great experiences about developer relations, developer experiences, developer marketing and developer communities.
about2.singapore (english): DevRel/Asia 2020 is online/virtual conference focuses on DevRel in Asia Pacific. We share great experiences about developer relations, developer experiences, developer marketing and developer communities.
about2.hongkong: DevRel/Asia 2020 is online/virtual conference focuses on DevRel in Asia Pacific. We share great experiences about developer relations, developer experiences, developer marketing and developer communities.

sponsors2.english: Reach out the unique audience by sponsoring DevRel/Asia 2020. Please contact us!
sponsors2.japan:
DevRel/Asia 2020の参加者は他では見られない、ユニークな方々ばかりです。
彼らへのアプローチにぜひサポンサードを検討してください！
sponsors2.korea:
DevRel/Asia 2020에서 개발자 마케팅/커뮤니티 전문가들을 만나보세요.
후원에 관심있으시면 언제든지 편하게 문의해주세요.

subscribe2.english: Please register your email address so you won't miss any update on DevRel/Asia 2020! We never send spam emails.

cfp2.english: You are expected by attendees that sharing your experience of developer relations, developer marketing and developer community.
cfp2.japan: You are expected by attendees that sharing your experience of developer relations, developer marketing and developer community.

cfp2.hongkong: You are expected by attendees that sharing your experience of developer relations, developer marketing and developer community.

cfp3.english: Each session has 25min maximum excluding Q&A time. You can speak in English or your common language like Japanese, Korean, Chinese and Hindu. You can send your CFP in English and your common language like Japanese, Korean, Chinese and Hindu. You have to use online communication tool like Zoom, StreamYard and etc. It depends on track’s rule.
